body: LEAD: Liliana Komorowka cannot forget a haunting scene from the evening of Dec. 13, 1981 - the day the Polish Government declared martial law and crushed Solidarity. title: FROM POLAND, EMIGREES ADD SPIRIT TO ARTS

body: LEAD: Candles sparked a fire in a Brooklyn apartment in which gas, electricity and water had been turned off, seriously injuring four people, including a 3-month-old infant, fire officials said yesterday. title: Four Badly Injured in Fire

body: LEAD: A Brooklyn man fell into the East River last night and his body was found floating nearby two hours later, the police said. title: MAN DROWNS IN EAST RIVER

body: LEAD: IN December 1981, Andrzej Czeczot was imprisoned by the martial-law Government in Poland. IN December 1981, Andrzej Czeczot was imprisoned by the martial-law Government in Poland. title: ART PEOPLE
